posts.post_title: FS: T332 1911 Helmar Stamp Fred Toney
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I have a raw T332 1911 Helmar Stamp of Fred Toney for sale.  I was just able to upgrade this one via ebay yesterday so I am putting this one up for sale to my fellow board members since I know it is a tough issue.  I am asking $20.00 for it.  That includes shipping.  Feel free to send offers also.  Email me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] if you want it.  Payment by paypal only.  Thanks

Tony Turner
